title: Winter salad
description: This crunchy winter slaw is a delicious, and healthy, accompaniment for leftover roast beef.Each serving provides 400kcal, 6g protein, 16g carbohydrate (of which 16g sugars), 31g fat (of which 3g saturates), 11g fibre and 0.2g salt.
ingredients: 2 carrots, peeled and cut into matchsticks
handful walnuts, out of their shells, roughly chopped
1 tbsp sherry or red wine vinegar
salt and freshly ground black pepper
